This facet does not appear to have any special properties.
Rumored by some to bring bad luck. Time passes much faster here.

You must have a free slot to do that.
You may not exit for another {0} second{1} because of combat.
The Ghods have taken pity and resurrected you.
The Ghods have sent you to Praetoseba.
Your body was burned by fire.

You raise your head above the water.
You are caught in the web.

The shimmering veil does not let you pass.
You are confused by the fire.
You have fallen to {0} in your {1} skill.
You feel a little bit more like Hercules.
a heavy battle axe with gleaming steel blades. The axe is emitting a faint blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
a black broadsword. The sword is emitting a faint blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
a small silver ring with a shiny black stone.
a long black iron rod with glowing red gems arranged in a ring near the center. The weapon is lawful.
a gold ring with a small red gem set into it.
a necklace of lustrous pink pearls.
a jacket made of a strange leather.
a halberd with a steel head.
a wooden spear with an iron tip.
a vest made from a peculiar stone colored leather.
a gold ring with a beautiful emerald.
a vest made from the scales of a wyvern.
a small gold ring emitting a faint blue glow.
a wooden shield faced with thin steel plates.
a yew longbow embellished with carvings.
a heavy crossbow with an ornately carved tiller and a peculiar black steel bow. The crossbow is emitting a soft blue glow.
a pair of gray boots rimmed with white fur.
a robe of imperial purple silk embroidered in gold thread with a chrysanthemum.
a silver bracelet set with tiny jade dolphins.
a wavy silver bracelet set with aquamarines.
a steel helm set with white wings.
a gold ring with a large red gem set into it.
a small gold ring with a glowing red gem.
a small iron ring with a large black stone.
a silver ring set with a pale, milky moonstone.
a gold ring set with four small diamonds encircling a fiery ruby.
a flexible ring of interwoven gold wire.
a soft ring of tiny green feathers.
a large silver ring, with a triangular piece of jade mounted among three small blue diamonds.
a brass ring engraved with undecipherable symbols.
a wide platinum band engraved with many tiny runes.
a shiny gold ring set with a tiny bejeweled scarab.
a steel ring of a sinuous dragon biting its own tail.
a ring make of a strange pink substance.
a gold ring with a dazzling diamond nestled in a rosette of rubies.
a small silver ring set with a very large polished sapphire.
a large silver ring with a deep black stone set among rubies. There is an eerie glow coming from the stone.
a diamond necklace with a glistening ruby.
a gold necklace with sparkling sapphires.
a silver chain with a silver and onyx scorpion.
a gold chain with a jade pendant.
a necklace of lustrous black pearls.
a twisted gold torc inscribed with glowing runes.
an ivory brooch of seven intertwined dragons.
a small silver dagger with an emerald blade hanging from a silver chain.
a crystal hummingbird hanging from a golden chain.
a silver bracelet made of scales.
a silver bracelet with sparkling scales.
a heavy silver bracelet set with tiny jade dolphins.
a heavy golden bracelet patterned with a scorpion.
a silver bracelet set with violet carbuncles.
a heavy golden bracelet patterned with maple leaves.
a silver bracelet engraved for decoration.
a leather armband studded with nodules.
a golden bracelet bejeweled with sapphires.
a white porcelain bottle adorned with lotus blossoms.
a clear bottle made of yellowish glass.
a clear bottle made of yellowish glass.
a clear bottle made of yellowish glass.
a clear bottle with a brown label.
a clear bottle filled with a green liquid.
a pale-blue bottle streaked with white lines.
a silvery glass bottle adorned with blue wave motifs.
a porcelain bottle stamped with a golden sun.
a black ceramic bottle with small gold whorls around its base.
a fat bottomed clay bottle with a thin tapering neck.
a reddish clay bottle with three black concentric circles painted on one side.
a small and narrow black bottle.
a large silver bottle encrusted with sapphires.
an odd looking gold colored bottle with a scorpion painted on one side.
a steel bottle stamped with the icon of a bull.
a green glass bottle. Inside you see a yellow liquid.
a green glass bottle. Inside you see a red liquid.
a heavy glass bottle mounted on a gold base and set with emeralds.
a burnished steel bottle with the icon of a falcon.
a porcelain bottle with small irises in raised relief around its base.
a bulbous silver-gray clay bottle with a decanter lip.
a tall, long-necked gray bottle decorated with yellow gems.
a rainbow hued bar of tourmaline.
a highly polished star ruby with a peculiar glow eminating from its core.
an enormous pear cut diamond of the purest blue-white radiance.
a fiery ruby that smoulders like the eye of a salamander.
an icy-blue sapphire cut into the shape of a stalking panther.
a dark-blue sapphire shaped like a whale.
a huge flawless sapphire of deepest blue.
a massive uncut emerald, as green as spring grass.
a rich, chocolate-brown tiger's eye streaked with amber bands.
a long black iron rod with glowing red gems arranged in a ring near the center. The rod is chaotic.
a large steel throwing hammer. The hammer is emitting a soft blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
a huge wooden club with a metal spike.
a long, surprisingly light staff composed of a bluish metal.
a large black staff, with the end carved into the shape of a cobra's head.
a three-sectioned staff made from a strange black wood. There is a curious monogram at one end.
a huge battle axe with shining silver blades. The axe is emitting a faint blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
a large thigh bone, with small pieces of meat adhered to it.
a large black staff covered with mystic runes.
a pine staff covered with elaborate carvings.
a steel bayonet fitted with a hammer head.
a heavy battle axe with gleaming steel blades. The axe is emitting a soft blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
a gilt-handled dagger with a fine steel blade.
a wooden spear with a long steel tip.
an exquisite lemurian misericorde dagger whose honed finish reveals the wood grained texture of the metal. The dagger is emitting a faint blue glow. The weapon is neutral.
a heavy halberd. The pole is perfect ash and the blade is forged from a golden copper colored alloy.
a silver colored javelin shaped like a lightning bolt.
a fine sword made of an otherworldly metal. Looking at the blade makes you dizzy, as if you were looking at the wings of a hummingbird. The sword is emitting a faint blue glow. The weapon is lawful.
an ebony staff encrusted with diamonds. The weapon emanates power. The weapon is lawful.
a fine throwing dagger with the symbol of the yasnaki marking the hilt.
an impossibly thin black blade mounted on a silver hilt.
a heavy flail with a huge spiked ball on a steel chain.
a pair of leather gauntlets with steel plates.
a pair of thickly padded leather boxing gloves.
a pair of gauntlets made of flat black steel lamallae with rosy crystalline claws projecting from the knuckles.
a vest made of dragon scales.
a vest made from the scales of a lizard.
a vest made from the hide of a alligator.
a vest made from the scales of a salamander.
a jacket made from the fur of a wolf.
a jacket made from the hide of a deer.
a jacket made from the skin of a shark.
a long coat made from the fur of a manticora.
a vest made from the milky white scales of an ice dragon.
a vest made from the silvery scales of a drake.
a black robe with a gold serpent.
a saffron robe made of a fine cloth.
a robe made from many torn strips of yellow cloth.
a glossy black robe with swirling stars.
a heavy black robe with a border of red runes.
a black cape with a silver skull.
a jacket made from the fur of a dog.
a coat made from the fur of a tiger.
a coat made from the fur of a huge white yeti.
a robe as black as a moonless night.
a jacket made from the skin of a hyena.
a jacket made from the feathers of a griffin.
a red robe with silver swirls.
a white robe with a black and silver scorpion.
a blue robe with a cresting wave.
a silver robe made of silk with a black lion.
a brown robe interwoven with a black pattern.
a black jacket made from the fur of a spider.
a satiny kimono of brilliant green silk in which golden threads weave a pattern of tiny dragons.
a coat made from the hide of a single huge bear.
a coat made from the skin of an enormous grizzly bear.
a blue and black robe adorned with silver swords and the circular emblem of the Ghods.
a pair of soft leather boots.
a pair of boots made from crocodile hide.
a pair of boots made from the hide of a snake.
a pair of leather boots made from the feet of a griffin.
a steel shield adorned with a black lightning bolt.
a small leather-bound book, with mystic runes engraved on the cover.
a small golden egg surrounded by a fiery glow.
a large ochre egg mottled with dark brown spots.
a blue-gray stone flecked with bits of glowing metal. The stone is known as yttril.
an oak wand adorned with black lines.
a stick carved with minute leering demon faces.
a hickory wand with gold and silver inlay.
a pine wand inscribed with tiny red runes.
an oyster with a shiny pearl in it.
a rounded, polished agate that seems to vibrate with inner warmth. The gem is emitting a faint blue glow.
a crystalline wand, an occasional spark leaps from the tip.
a book entitled 'Head Games' written by Silvermist.
a book entitled 'Sir Geoffrey and the Beast' written by Silvermist.
a book entitled 'Legend of Reyanne Riversong' written by Silvermist.
a scroll entitled 'Not For the Faint of Heart'.
a scroll entitled '3 Staff is Better Than None'.
a scroll entitled 'You Are What You Eat'.
a scroll entitled 'Your Bow Is You Friend.'
a scroll entitled 'Everything is Not As It May Appear'.
a scroll entitled 'B W A R L I C H'.
a scroll entitled 'Minotaurs, Myth or Legend?'.
a scroll entitled 'Dead But Not Forgotten'.
a scroll entitled 'Army of the Damned'.
a book entitled 'Welcome to Kesmai' written by Silvermist.
a book entitled 'A Burning Question' written by Silvermist.
a pair of leather gauntlets with steel plates. The gauntlets are emitting a faint blue glow.
a book entitled 'Autumn Reminiscence' written by Silvermist.
a gold and black figurine of a snarling tiger.
a white porcelain figurine of a snarling griffin.
a red figurine of a flying dragon.
a beautifully wrapped package with a golden bow.
a book entitled 'The Engraver' written by Silvermist.
a small sphere of blue glass.
a glass ball filled with a milky fluid.
an impossibly thin black blade mounted on a silver hilt. The rapier is emitting a faint blue glow.
a fine sword made of an otherworldly metal. Looking at the blade makes you dizzy, as if you were looking at the wings of a hummingbird. The longsword is emitting a faint blue glow.
a ring with crashing ocean waves.
a pair of gloves that emanate strands of darkness.
a pale sapphire carved into the shape of a swallow.
a rare, expertly cut blue diamond.
an onyx, cut into an oval shape.
an enormous raw sapphire. A good jeweler could cut this into something exquisite.
a flawless ruby cut into the shape of a heart.
a fan with black steel blades.
a silk cloth with a gold chrysanthemum on it.

Inside you see a red liquid.
Inside you see a clear liquid.
Inside you see a yellow liquid.
You feel a momentary vibration in the {0} as you lift it.
The item leaps out of your hand.
The weapon leaps out of your hand.
The gauntlets leap off your hands.
You have been stunned by the blow.
You have been stunned by the shot.
A strange feeling comes over you.
You may not put on that ring here.
The presence of high levels of the Dark Power prevents you from putting on the ring.
The presence of high levels of the Dark Power prevents you from removing the ring.
A recall ring has been reset!
The ring disappears in a puff of smoke.
You have gained 1 point of strength adds.
You have gained 1 point of dexterity adds.
You can't do that when you are dead.
You can't do that when you are stunned.
You are unable to look from here.
You can't do that while in a trance.
You are not a member of a party.
You are already a member of a party.
You no longer have that item in your possession.
You are not skilled enough to cast at a target.
You can't do that when you are blind.
There is no warmed spell to cast.
You are too heavy to move.
Invalid data received. Report it or stop hacking!
You can't do that when you are stunned.
You must have a free hand to do that.
You don't have enough stamina to do that.
You can't throw to that location.
You don't have that item in your hand.
You can't throw that from your belt.
Your weapon is not ready to shoot.
Your left hand must be empty to do that.
You don't have a bow weapon in your right hand.
You can't get there from here.
You can't do that when you are dead.
I don't see a counter here.
I can't tell who you mean.
You can't see anyone by that name here.
You can't look at that hex.
You can't see that from here.
Invalid spell target or path usage.
That spell has not been warmed.
You are not trained in the casting of that spell.
You are not trained in the art of spell casting.
You can't close the door. Doorway is blocked.
I cannot serve you if I cannot see you.
Please step up to a counter.
I don't know how to train you with that item.
I cannot train you in that discipline.
Come back when you have become more skilled.
I can teach you no more.
You can learn more only by practicing.
Are you trying to be funny?
You must practice more before I can train you again.
You have been trained in the {0} skill. Go now and practice.
Please put some coins on the counter.
Please put some coins on the ground.
I am not qualified to critique that skill.
You are {0:#0} percent above the level of {1}.
You have achieved the level of {0}.
You are below your potential level of {0}.
You have risen from {0} to {1} in your {2} skill.
That spell book does not belong to you!
You have fallen and sprained your ankle.
Thank you. Your balance is now {0} coins.
Would you tell me the amount?
You don't have that much in your account.
Please put the item on the counter.
There is nothing of value here.
You can't seem to fit the item.
The wall closes in around you.
You may not exit while blind, stunned or feared.
You do not have access to that command.
The spell of {0} has worn off.
You are unable to get a good grip on this weapon.
You are {0} in the use of this weapon.
It looks like a {0} foot drop.
You may not exit while carrying a corpse.
Someone is interfering with your concentration.
You are hiding in the shadows.
An involuntary tremor runs up your limbs, making it impossible to rest.
The poison has been neutralized by {0}.
{0} is enveloped by a warm blue glow flowing from {1}.
The weapon emits a faint amber glow.
The weapon disappears in a puff of smoke.
It is emitting a faint amber glow.
You are not able to carry that much more weight.
That spell is not yet available to you.
You are not of my profession! Get out!
There are no spells I can teach you.
I don't know what spell you mean.
I can not train you further.
Only Fighters can be trained to become Knights.
You are not experienced enough to become a Knight.
Will you keep faith, hope, and justice?
Very well, seek me out should you reconsider.
You are now a Knight! Wear this ring with courage and honor.
Please empty your right hand for the ceremony.
Do you wish to quest for greater glory and the causes of Knighthood?
Slay the small dragon, then inquire of the hermit's sister.
I cannot teach you, as you are not a Knight.
Seek the Knight who roams the surface in Oakvael first.
You must bring me the gem from the small dragon's hoard.
Now, off to the land of ice and snow for the thin-bladed bane of Knights.
For you, I will sell one for {0} coins.
You find yourself confused and missing a few gold coins.
You feel sick to your stomach.
Bring me iron and yttril and I will make you the weapon.
Wield this weapon with courage and honor.
You have been knocked into a wall.
The presence of high levels of the Dark Power prevents you from putting on the ring.
The presence of high levels of the Dark Power prevents you from removing the ring.
The anguished spirit prevents you from travelling.
The anguished spirit of {0} prevents you from travelling.
Even given the strength of the ghods, you could not throw this.
You could not detect any secret doors.
The target is too near to perform a jumpkick.
The item was quickly taken by someone.
You can't seem to decide which spell to warm.
You don't know how to warm that.
You must first warm the spell.
You don't know how to cast that.
It is emitting a radiant glow.
You are fully trained in the level of {0}.
You are trained to {0}% in the level of {1}.
You are fully trained in the level of {0}. You are trained to {1}% in the level of {2}.
You do not have enough room to do that.
You can't place that item in your backpack.
I don't understand the path you want to use.
You have strayed from the path of justice and honor.
The dull opal crumbles as you lift it.
I don't have anything of interest.
During your struggle to push, it suddenly disappears.
You are unable to lift it.
The bottle contains a Neutralize Poison potion.
You don't have an open bottle in your hands.
Bring me an obsidian egg and I will make you the weapon.
Slay the Yeti atop Axe Glacier and bring me his dagger.
Seek out the Knight of the Pit, return her Halberd from the Dragon.
You must bring me the gem from the dagger from the Yeti's hoard.
Seek the Knight who covets the dagger.
Slay the Dragon of the pit, return my Halberd.
Slay the Vampire north of town by your own hand.
Land the killing blow on the Necromancer in the Blood Caves.
A longbow made of faint blue wood. The string appears to be woven from strands of silver.
The combat adds of +5 and is neutral in alignment.
Here is a magic potion for your troubles.
Bring me a Strong Strength Ring and an emerald and I will exchange them for something more useful.
The target is too far to perform a kick.
I can not teach you greater mastery of your hand skill. But--
You may be worthy of another power.
Do you wish to seek out a powerful weapon?
I ask that you rescue Konran and help him return home. He shall give you <text color="#CF9FFF">silk finery</text>.
To be considered worthy, slay the ninja shidosha in Leng and retrieve our <text color="#CF9FFF">idol of worship</text>.
Return the items to Puck in Leng, there you will find your reward.
I am uncertain that you could guarantee my safe return. I trust only a martial artist.
Thank you! I did not trust that bafoon {0} that came by earlier.
I could have done that myself. But, thanks for your assistance {0}.
Please hurry. My brother must be so worried.
Bring me <text color="#CF9FFF">silk finery</text> and an <text color="#CF9FFF">idol of worship</text>.
